title: ‘It Would Be Sick to Be On the Podium’: New Beginnings, Same Tour de France Dreams for Ben O’Connor
content:
New Jayco AlUla leader O’Connor shows ambition tempered with modesty as his new adventure begins: 'My aim is to perform all year round.'

Read the full article at ‘It Would Be Sick to Be On the Podium’: New Beginnings, Same Tour de France Dreams for Ben O’Connor on Velo.
author: sstokes
